text: Dogg Food is the first studio record by Tha Dogg Pound. Snoop Dogg was involved in the production. The record had controversial lyrics on it. The album had two big singles, "Let's Play House" and "New York, New York". The album sold over 2 million records. The record was released on October 31, 1995. The original release date was moved because of controversy. Category:1995 albums Category:Death Row Records albums Category:Hip hop albums
title: Dogg Food
